markdown: | icon = poe2 breastplate_armor_pallegina_fivesuns icon.png | description = Pallegina had followed her orders from the ducs bels, helping to establish an exclusive trade arrangement between the Vailian Republics and the tribes of Eir Glanfath. Strenghened by the Watcher's gift of souls, the furious Dyrwoodans waged war against the Republics for two long years. The Republics gained a great deal of wealth in trade but suffered the loss of many vessels and thousands of lives. Several of the ducal families lost favor with their citizens. Riots in Selona claimed the life of that city's duc, and the other ducs bels were pressured into relinquishing the exclusive trade rights to end the conflict with the Dyrwood. Pallegina was honored for her service at the opening of trade. Thankfully her reputation among the ducs and within the Brotherhood was not tarnished by what followed. Pallegina continued to proudly wear her breastplate, which declares her loyalty to the Brotherhood, the ducs, and the Republics. | added_in = poe2 | equipment_slot = Armor | armor_type = Breastplate | armor_category = Medium armor | requirements = | is_soulbound = no | is_unique = yes | value = 340 | shop_value = 1700 | recovery_speed = +35% | dr_base = 8 | dr_crush = | dr_pierce = | dr_slash = 6 | dr_burn = | dr_corrode = | dr_freeze = | dr_shock = 6 | armor_bonuses = | curr_enchantments = Fine armor (Deadfire){{!}}Fine;Defiant (Deadfire){{!}}Defiant | poss_enchantments = | rel_quests = | rel_items = Honor Guard Breastplate (Pallegina){{!}}Honor Guard Breastplate;Five Suns Breastplate;Desgraza Breastplate | rel_abilities = | rel_talents = | internalname = Breastplate_Armor_U_Pallegina_Five_Suns_Breastplate | guid = c621daa5-3223-43a7-83ce-dcd70ebd6ca3 | location = * Worn by [Pallegina](/pallegina/) (if she followed the ducs orders in {{poe1}}, and you distributed the souls to the Dyrwood '''OR''' if she was disgraced and was pardoned as a result of the souls being distributed to the Dyrwood) }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Breastplate}} in {{poe2}}. ## Description {{Description |{{#var:description}}}} ## Acquisition {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} ## Upgrades {{pe2crafttable|cols=3| {{Pe2craftmod| |mod ={{pe2mod|24b0be7a-69fb-4f9a-a8b8-4c2756076fc9}} |effect =+5% Damage done with weapons (scales with lost health) (Normalized health * -0.1) + 1.15 |cost =3000 |ing1 =f5ab3a19-47bd-4935-9a27-9c495996fcab |q1 =1 |ing2 =0e274db1-566d-46c8-b485-4392e0c9553f |q2 =1 |ing3 =f163ffbf-9539-4e6e-ab78-33fb5519066e |q3 =1 |ing4 = |q4 = |ing5 = |q5 = |removed= }} }}
raw: {{Infobox armor poe2 | name = {{pagename nd}} | icon = poe2 breastplate_armor_pallegina_fivesuns icon.png | description = Pallegina had followed her orders from the ducs bels, helping to establish an exclusive trade arrangement between the Vailian Republics and the tribes of Eir Glanfath. Strenghened by the Watcher's gift of souls, the furious Dyrwoodans waged war against the Republics for two long years. The Republics gained a great deal of wealth in trade but suffered the loss of many vessels and thousands of lives. Several of the ducal families lost favor with their citizens. Riots in Selona claimed the life of that city's duc, and the other ducs bels were pressured into relinquishing the exclusive trade rights to end the conflict with the Dyrwood. Pallegina was honored for her service at the opening of trade. Thankfully her reputation among the ducs and within the Brotherhood was not tarnished by what followed. Pallegina continued to proudly wear her breastplate, which declares her loyalty to the Brotherhood, the ducs, and the Republics. | added_in = poe2 | equipment_slot = Armor | armor_type = Breastplate | armor_category = Medium armor | requirements = | is_soulbound = no | is_unique = yes | value = 340 | shop_value = 1700 | recovery_speed = +35% | dr_base = 8 | dr_crush = | dr_pierce = | dr_slash = 6 | dr_burn = | dr_corrode = | dr_freeze = | dr_shock = 6 | armor_bonuses = | curr_enchantments = Fine armor (Deadfire){{!}}Fine;Defiant (Deadfire){{!}}Defiant | poss_enchantments = | rel_quests = | rel_items = Honor Guard Breastplate (Pallegina){{!}}Honor Guard Breastplate;Five Suns Breastplate;Desgraza Breastplate | rel_abilities = | rel_talents = | internalname = Breastplate_Armor_U_Pallegina_Five_Suns_Breastplate | guid = c621daa5-3223-43a7-83ce-dcd70ebd6ca3 | location = * Worn by [[Pallegina]] (if she followed the ducs orders in {{poe1}}, and you distributed the souls to the Dyrwood '''OR''' if she was disgraced and was pardoned as a result of the souls being distributed to the Dyrwood) }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Breastplate}} in {{poe2}}. == Description == {{Description |{{#var:description}}}} == Acquisition == {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} ==Upgrades== {{pe2crafttable|cols=3| {{Pe2craftmod| |mod ={{pe2mod|24b0be7a-69fb-4f9a-a8b8-4c2756076fc9}} |effect =+5% Damage done with weapons (scales with lost health) (Normalized health * -0.1) + 1.15 |cost =3000 |ing1 =f5ab3a19-47bd-4935-9a27-9c495996fcab |q1 =1 |ing2 =0e274db1-566d-46c8-b485-4392e0c9553f |q2 =1 |ing3 =f163ffbf-9539-4e6e-ab78-33fb5519066e |q3 =1 |ing4 = |q4 = |ing5 = |q5 = |removed= }} }}
title: Five Suns Breastplate
